title: Increased D, decreased S impact price, quantity

content.question: How will an increase in demand and a simultaneous decrease in supply affect the equilibrium price and quantity of a good in a market?

topic.text: 1.6: Market Equilibrium, Disequilibrium, and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
